title: Ticket #1833: condor_config_val needs -subsystem option
description: condor_config_val needs a -subsystem command-line option, similar to that of condor_on/off.
remarks:
2011-Jan-05 16:07:42 by tstclair:
wasn't that changed to -daemon ?

2011-Jan-05 18:22:17 by ilikhan:
Currently it supports only a subset of specified daemons ( master, schedd, startd, collector, and negotiator).

There is an option like:
-name daemon_name (query the specified daemon for its configuration)
However, this option is a bit misleading because it actually asks for a machine name not for a daemon name.

Therefore we need an option like:
-subsystem daemon_name
or
-daemon daemon_name
creator: jfrey
